Literature.Title: Novel cyclic lipodepsipeptide from Pseudomonas syringae pv. lachrymans strain 508 and syringopeptin antimicrobial activities.
Literature.Author: Grgurina I, Bensaci M, Pocsfalvi G, Mannina L, Cruciani O, Fiore A, Fogliano V, Sorensen KN, Takemoto JY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium smegmatis ATCC 14468(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=21.8µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 14381(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>250µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris ATCC 13315(MIC=>250µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=>250µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>250µg/ml),Serratia marcescens ATCC 8100(MIC=>250µg/ml),Citrobacter freundii ATCC 8090(MIC=>250µg/ml),Rhodotorula mucilaginosa ATCC 9449(MIC=2.7µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=5.4µg/ml),Rhodotorula mucilaginosa(MIC=10.9µg/ml)
